bilingual.source: Is it next to the police station?
They are going to the police station.
Need I report it to the police?
bilingual.target: 我需要向警察报告这件事吗？

bilingual.source: The police station is in Saudi Arabia.
The hotel is across from the police station.

list.abstract: 警察是指国家及其统治者，根据国家和统治者阶级的意志，按照确定标准设置的警察机关及其警务人员。警察一般具有武装性质，能够维护国家安全和社会治安秩序，在警察机关中行使警察职权，履行警察职责。 经党中央批准、国务院批复，自2021年起，将每年1月10日设立为“中国人民警察节” 。
POLICE是一个英语单词，是警察的意思。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Did the police find something?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么？警察有什么发现吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, she believed you. But she didn't call the police.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她相信你了。但她没有叫警察。

yingyinNormal.en: Mike, he's a policeman. Yeah? Not exactly standard police issue. Really? Oh, my god.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克，他是个警察。是吗？这可不是警察的标准配备，信了吧？我的天。

yingyinNormal.en: One, I punch you right in the mouth and you call the police on me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一是我揍你，你叫警察来抓我。

yingyinNormal.en: You're not supposed to look. Oh yeah, like there are police for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能偷看，警察又不会抓。

yingyinNormal.en: And I ran all the way here from the Polk Station, the police station.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是从警差局，警察局一路跑来的。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know why all the police? Yeah, sure. You know why.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道这些警察是怎么回事吗？是，你知道为什么。

yingyinNormal.en: And I can make the world a better place. I am going to be a police officer!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以让世界更美好，我要做警察！

yingyinNormal.en: Armed police, you're surrounded! Give it to me. Give it to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: “武装警察，你被包围了 ！”东西给我。给我！

yingyinNormal.en: Seems we're all paying the price for his rejection from the police academy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这孩子没能进入警察学校我们都跟着遭罪。

yingyinNormal.en: These officers, God bless them, they remind me of my days when I had to run from the police. But they can't follow me up here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些警察，愿主保佑他们，他们让我想起躲警察的日子，但他们不能跟我到钢索上。

yingyinNormal.en: The same police that buried his DUI? And you think I was involved?
yingyinNormal.zh: 掩盖他醉驾的同一帮警察? 而你认为这事与我有关？

yingyinNormal.en: My arm, my chest, his call. His call will be to the police.
yingyinNormal.zh: 签我的手臂，我的胸膛，看他的意思吧。他只会有叫警察的意思。

yingyinNormal.en: That means we tell no one, not the police, not our families. No one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以不能告诉任何人，包括警察、包括家人、缄口不言。

yingyinNormal.en: And possibly most damning of all, the police arrested someone else for this murder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许最糟糕的是，警察曾逮捕过另一名嫌犯。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, here. Heisenberg is pulled over by a police officer. And the policeman says, Did you know you were going 85 miles per hour?
yingyinNormal.zh: 来，听好了。有天德国物理学家海森堡开车被警察拦下。警察对他说，你知道你刚才开到了时速137公里吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And then there's Dauntless. They're our protectors, our soldiers, our police.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后是无畏派，他们是我们的保护者，我们的士兵，我们的警察。

yingyinNormal.en: So you can't switch the bomb off?! You can't switch the bomb off and you didn't call the police!
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是说，你不会关炸弹? 你不会拆弹，还不叫警察。

yingyinNormal.en: You done? No, I'm not done. So you all wanted me to break into a police station, fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说完了吗？没，还没，先前你们让我闯进警察局，好吧，我答应了。

yingyinNormal.en: What did the police say? My Thanksgiving leftover sandwich. I can't believe someone just ate it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 警察怎么处理的？那是感恩节剩下的三明治，竟然给人偷吃掉。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 警察部队；警察；警方；警察部门；警察机构

word_family.mean: n. 政策；方针；保单；谨慎行为；权宜之举

sense_info_list.en: the department of government that keeps order and enforces law, investigates crimes, and makes arrests

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Police</highlight> investigators questioned workers involved in the restoration of the monument.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警方调查人员询问了参与纪念碑修复的工人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Police</highlight> and fire services will spend the next 48 hours assessing the "security and safety" of the 850-year-old structure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警察和消防部门将在接下来的48小时内评估这座有850年历史的建筑的“安保和安全”。

examination_example.sentence: Access to fashion, and the brands who <highlight>police</highlight> it, are becoming less and less relevant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接触时尚，以及管理时尚的品牌，正变得越来越无关紧要。

sample.mean: n. 政策；方针；保单；谨慎行为；权宜之举

examination_example.sentence: It is helping the <highlight>police</highlight> with the investigation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它正在帮助警察进行调查。

examination_example.sentence: But despite the sticky situation, firefighters and <highlight>police</highlight> attending to the cleanup were reportedly cheerful about the long task ahead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管形势严峻，但据报道，参与清理工作的消防员和警察对未来的漫长任务感到高兴。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman think of the <highlight>police</highlight> fining drivers?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女士对警察处罚司机有什么看法?

examination_example.sentence: The head of road <highlight>policing</highlight> said, "I would urge drivers to take extra care on the roads for their journeys."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巡警负责人表示：“我将敦促司机在旅途中格外注意道路。”

examination_example.sentence: What did the head of road <highlight>policing</highlight> urge drivers to do?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巡警负责人敦促司机做什么?

sample.mean: n. 政策；方针；保单；谨慎行为；权宜之举

word_usage.usage: 用法police是集体名词，表示复数意义，常与the连用，作主语时谓语用复数（类似词：people, cattle等）。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>police</highlight> searched the area for several days.

examination_example.sentence: Larry asked the <highlight>police</highlight> if he was needed or free to go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拉里问警察是需要他还是可以自由离开。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: At 6:30 pm, the <highlight>police</highlight> arrived and started questioning people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下午6:30，警察赶到并开始询问人们。
